name: Synthwave '84
description:
A unique retro theme that provides the perfect glow and vibe to your Discord.

While not required, I recommend you install this theme as a userscript. You can find that option below when clicking on 'Install style as userscript'. I recommend this because some of the built-in animations won't work otherwise. Again, not required to enjoy the overall look and feel of the theme!

>> Check out https://github.com/CelestialReaver/Synthwave84-DiscordWeb for more screenshots and info about this style.

user.name: CelestialReaver
user.about: I develop games, cybersecurity defense/offense tools, themes, plugins, create bots, and roast coffee.

additional_info:
**Sleek, clean, retro, and unique - carefully crafted theme that gives you a clean and unique retro experience. 

**Soft neon glow - soothing not distracting, the neon glow adds to your experience and does not distract.

**Gentle unread animation - never miss an unread. you will be given a gentle animated visual notification of unreads.

**Status marquee built-in- see someone's entire status as it scrolls. hover over their status to stop the scrolling and read it! 

**Perfect for dark theme and light theme fans - not too bright, not too dark. a well balanced theme.
